name: 30% Engineering QA/QC Review
description: Early design validation - survey, existing conditions, title sheet setup

items.text: Survey completed topographic QA checklist with surface elevation review
Has the project been scoped with ADA ramps and utility replacement identified?
Confirm utilities provided match GIS and utility maps (if applicable)
Do all drawings have a north arrow shown correctly?
Do all drawings have scale shown correctly?
Print and complete scale check
Plan has uniform size of text and line weights
Are north arrow and scale in same location near title block?
Run spell check on each sheet
Check north arrow rotation
Check bar scale and scale listed in title block to match
Check for overlapping text & misplaced text/leaders
Check for missing layers and verify current layer state
Check labels on centerline stations
Are existing contours shown and labeled?
Check labels on streets and bodies of water
Update Band elevations in profiles
Is the title block consistent on each sheet in the plan set?
Is the date in the title block correct?
Is the project number correct?
Provide the correct initials in the title block for drawn and designed by
Are city/village/municipality/owner information/phone/address correct on title sheet?
Is the underground utility locator note present?
Is the project title stated clearly and correctly?
Is the client name stated clearly and correctly?
Is the location and vicinity map shown correctly?
Is the project area shown correctly on the title sheet?
Confirm the map on the title sheet is legible
Confirm the POB and POE are correctly shown on the project location map
Does the sheet index correspond with all the sheets in the set?
Is all sheet numbering correct?
Confirm Right of Way and Property boundaries are shown on existing conditions
Are the project limits clearly shown and labeled?
Are the adjacent property lines clearly shown and labeled?
Are the existing benchmarks clearly shown and labeled?
Is the horizontal control provided and listed?
Is the survey disclaimer shown (if applicable)?
Verify phasing areas (if applicable)
Check POB and POE is located properly throughout the plan set
Are all existing structures clearly identified and labeled?
Are all existing underground utilities shown and labeled?
Caution boxes have been placed with critical utilities identified
Is the legend provided with all line types for existing conditions?
Confirm all spelling on plan notes, keynotes, and utility callouts (spell check)
Confirm bands in profile have been updated to show correct elevation
